law.catch_line: Receipts to be used for general fund purposes.
law.text: Except as provided in KRS 211.285, receipts derived from taxes assessed and collected under the provisions of this chapter shall be appropriated for general fund purposes.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 390, sec. 10, effective June 1, 1982.
